channel.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour Podcast Feed
channel.description:
The Tiz N Bogin Hour - Where Dignity Lives! Join Tiz N Bogin along with the rest of the staff at TnB as they cover everything and anything that may ponder the mind. No topic is off topic and you never know what to expect!
A long time fav returns! It's the most amazing FREE podcast that you'll EVER experience!
channel.dc:creator: TizNBogin@hotmail.com
channel.itunes:author: Tiz N Bogin
channel.itunes:summary: The Tiz N Bogin Hour - Where Dignity Lives! Join Tiz N Bogin along with the rest of the staff at TnB as they cover everything and anything that may ponder the mind. No topic is off topic and you never know what to expect!A long time fav returns! It's the most amazing FREE podcast that you'll EVER experience!

item.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour IX
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin present the first show of the New Year!
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:00 min / 40.6 MB);

Show Highlights - 

It's the first Tiz 'N' Bogin Hour show of 2009, and not a better time could've been had!  The Tiz 'N' Bogin crew looks back at the year that once was.  This show, which was taped at the Tisville Recreational Centre For Pro Americans, brings out not only the best of Tiz & Bogin - but, the best of 2008 as well!                                               

As always, anything's possible on the Tiz N' Bogin Hour!
item.dc:creator: TizNBogin@hotmail.com

item.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour VIII
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin present the goods!
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:00 min / 39.6 MB);

Show Highlights - Featuring our special guest - Dr. Norm!
-The Exploration of American Double Talk! "Are you Ready?" or "Aptly Prepared?"
-Dr. Norm evaluates a troubled Tiz N Bogin Listener brought in from the streets of New York City!
-Big news about The Tiz N Bogin Hour!
-Plenty of suprises and interaction with YOU - the TnBH universe!

As always, anything's possible on the Tiz N' Bogin Hour!
item.dc:creator: The Tiz N Bogin Hour

item.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour VII
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin present the No Spin circumference!
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:00 min / 31 MB);

Presidential Election Special Show Highlights - Featuring our announcer, Alice Cooper!
-A look at the new era of our Presidency!
-Old Man Wendell attempts the unthinkable!
-The inargural 'Ask TiZ'!
-A very special edition of Todd Bogin's List Of Things That Should Not Exist!

As always, anything's possible on the Tiz N' Bogin Hour!
item.dc:creator: The Tiz N Bogin Hour

item.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour VI
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin present the Election special!
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:00 min / 37 MB);

Presidential Election Special Show Highlights - Featuring our new announcer, Alice Cooper!
-Film Director/Writer Joe Swanberg
-A Historical Look at the Presidency!
-The Great Debate - An Intern Fights for his job!
-And plenty more that is both Presidential and Worldly!

Anything's possible on the Tiz N' Bogin Hour!
item.dc:creator: The Tiz N Bogin Hour

item.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour V
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin moderate the spin!
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:00 min / 34 MB);

Show Highlights - Featuring our new announcer, Alice Cooper!
-On-site coverage of local political fundraisers!
-Producer/Songwriter Mark Jacobs (Bon Jovi, Aerosmith, Ozzy Osboure)
-Astrologer Elvyra Mercury!
-Old Man Wendell!

Anything's possible!
item.dc:creator: The Tiz N Bogin Hour

item.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour IV
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin factor in!
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:00 min / 34 MB);

Show Highlights
-A candid look at the upcoming and recent U.S. Election Debates!
-Executive Producer Seamus demands a new contract - DURING THE SHOW!
-All the news and views that's unfit to talk about anywhere else!
-Cannon From FoulMouthShirts check in on the show where dignity lives!
-The First "Am I A Terrorist Threat" Quiz is given - Tiz N' Bogin due their American duty!

And plenty of more surprises, as always!
item.dc:creator: The Tiz N Bogin Hour

item.title: The Tiz N Bogin Hour III
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin delivers a zone which doesn't spin!
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:00 min / 27 MB);

Show Highlights
-NY Times Best Selling Author of "4 Hour Work Week" Tim Ferriss (http://www.fourhourworkweek.com/blog/)
-Personnel changes on the big show!
-"American Bull$h!T"
-All the news and views that's unfit to print!
item.dc:creator: The Tiz N Bogin Hour

item.title: The Tiz N' Bogin Hour II
item.description:
Tiz N' Bogin gear up for Europe in the heat of Olympic fever.
File Download [DSL or Cable] (1:48 min / 71 MB);

Show Highlights
-Flip-Flopping
-Todd Bogin's List Of Things That Should No Longer Exist
-Kevin Jonas of The Jonas Brothers!
-and much more!
item.dc:creator: TizNBogin@hotmail.com
